His career was marked by innovative music and a memorable performance in the "Untitled (How Does It Feel)" video.

India's GDP growth: IMF revises 2025 outlook upwards to 6.6%; 2026 dip seen on Trump tariffs
description: India's GDP growth forecast for 2025 has been boosted to 6.6% by the IMF, reflecting strong reform initiatives and digital advancements. Despite global economic moderation and tariff concerns, the nation's robust domestic fundamentals are expected to maintain its position as a key global growth engine, poised to become the world's third-largest economy.

Delhi-NCR pollution: GRAP stage-1 curbs imposed after air quality hits 'poor' category
description: The commission for air quality management has activated Stage-I of the graded response action plan in Delhi-NCR. This action follows a drop in the air quality index to the 'poor' category. Forecasts predict continued poor air quality. All implementing agencies will intensify measures to prevent further deterioration. Citizens are urged to follow the citizen charter.

Watch: Virat Kohli's singing video goes viral; Anushka Sharma reacts
description: Virat Kohli is set to feature in India's upcoming three-match ODI series against Australia, commencing October 19. Arriving in Delhi, Kohli's preparation is marked by a viral video of him singing at his sangeet ceremony. The series will be played across Perth, Adelaide, and Sydney, with Kohli aiming to replicate his strong historical performance in Australian conditions.

title: ‘This was scary’: Travis Kelce’s head-first fall vs Lions sparks concussion fears
description: Travis Kelce's scary head-first fall during the Chiefs' 30-17 win over the Lions sparked fan concern, with many questioning the lack of immediate concussion evaluation. Despite the alarming incident, Kelce played on, later focusing on the team's tough victory rather than his own safety.

title: Pune civic body to spend Rs 81 crore to clean 2,515-km-long sewage lines without human intervention
'Pak casualties along LoC over 100': DGMO Lt Gen Rajiv Ghai on Operation Sindoor - watch
description: India's Director General Military Operations revealed Operation Sindoor, a precise military response to the Pahalgam terror attack, resulted in over 100 Pakistani casualties. This operation, a blend of military action and diplomatic strategy, also saw the Indus Water Treaty temporarily suspended. The successful termination of the three perpetrators after a 96-day pursuit highlights India's commitment to justice.

title: India Post resumes postal services to US; launches duty-paid system
description: India is set to resume all international postal services to the US from October 15, 2025. A new Delivery Duty Paid (DDP) system will collect customs duties upfront in India, ensuring faster clearance and seamless delivery. This move follows US import rule changes and aims to boost exports by offering transparent and affordable shipping.

Earth hits first climate tipping point as coral reefs face irreversible collapse
description: Earth has hit its first climate tipping point: warm water coral reefs face irreversible decline. Scientists warn that without immediate global heating reduction to 1.2°C, these vital ecosystems, supporting millions, will collapse. Widespread bleaching and unprecedented stress are already pushing reefs beyond their limits, demanding urgent action to protect marine life and human livelihoods.

He accused the opposition of spreading rumors, stating that all five NDA parties are united and ready for the polls under Nitish Kumar's guidance.

Ahmedabad airport on high alert: Qatar Airways flight reports cabin pressure issue
description: A Qatar Airways flight from Doha to Hong Kong declared a full emergency over Indian airspace due to a sudden loss of cabin pressure. The Boeing 777, flight QR 816, made a safe emergency landing at Ahmedabad Airport. All passengers and crew were unharmed, and airport operations resumed shortly after.

IPS officer 'suicide' case: Another Haryana cop shoots self; records final video
description: A Haryana police officer, Sandeep Lather, allegedly committed suicide, accusing Inspector General Y Puran Kumar of corruption in a video. Lather's death follows Kumar's own alleged suicide, where he named several officers. The incident has led to internal investigations and administrative changes within the Haryana police department.

title: Roger Federer vs Rafael Nadal net worth 2025: Federer leads with $1.1 billion fortune
description: Tennis titans Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal continue to command massive earnings post-retirement. Federer, with a net worth of $1.1 billion, boasts lucrative endorsements and a stake in On Running. Nadal, valued at $220 million, excels on court and runs his own academy. Their enduring legacies and potential exhibition matches captivate fans globally.

title: Did Mahomes boycott Bad Bunny for Charlie Kirk? Truth explained
description: Viral claims that Patrick Mahomes would boycott the 2026 Super Bowl over Bad Bunny's halftime show and join Turning Point USA are false. Mahomes has made no such statements regarding Bad Bunny or the political group. His wife, Brittany, made a general comment about hate after Charlie Kirk's death, but Mahomes himself remains apolitical.

title: Rebecca J fires back at Offset with claim about Stefon Diggs, Cardi B
description: Rapper Offset faced backlash after implying Instagram model Rebecca J pursued him. Rebecca J responded strongly, calling Offset's actions embarrassing and defending Cardi B. She praised Cardi as self-made and referenced NFL player Stefon Diggs in a viral comment. The internet reacted to Rebecca J's defense and sharp retort, highlighting her confidence and willingness to respond.

title: Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests using Zoho’s Arattai
description: India's Supreme Court has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right. The court dismissed a doctor's plea to restore her blocked account, emphasizing users must adhere to platform policies. It suggested alternatives like Zoho's Arattai app, which has seen a surge in popularity.

title: Jack Roslovic reportedly lost nearly $10M before signing with Oilers
description: Jack Roslovic rejected a significant three-year offer from the Edmonton Oilers. He sought a more lucrative deal elsewhere but remained unsigned for months. The Oilers later offered a one-year contract. Roslovic now aims to impress this season to secure a better deal next summer. This situation highlights the unpredictable nature of NHL contracts.
